response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This extraordinary piece carries a unique value proposition that could significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. We are offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your potential to maximize the product's benefits. Don't miss out on this chance to secure an asset that could potentially grow in value and contribute immensely to your success. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
